name: Jaina Proudmoore Mod
description: 加入了《炉石传说》中的法师——吉安娜·普罗德摩尔 包括75张卡牌，9个遗物，9种药水。平衡性调整：削弱了冻结效果，加强了燃烧效果和火焰卡牌，以及其他平衡性调整。Add Jaina Proudmoore in Hearthstone, including 75 cards, 9 unique relics and 9 unique potions.Added English localization.Improved English texts.Balance change: weakened "freeze", strengthened "burning" (renamed from combustion) and fire cards.
